project_plan.name: Random Password Generator
project_plan.description: Create a Python script that generates a random password, which includes uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters. The length of the password should be configurable by the user.

task.name: Implement functionality to define the password length
Implement functionality to generate random uppercase letters
Implement functionality to generate random lowercase letters
Implement functionality to generate random numbers
Implement functionality to generate random special characters
Implement full random password generation logic
Write tests for each of the functionalities above
Execute tests on the password generation functionality to ensure it works as expected
